verbose_text: Smad7 belongs to the group of antagonistic / inhibitory Smads (I-Smad), and Smad7 or dorsomorphin has been suggested to prevent BMP signaling in a study using mutant activin receptor like 2 (ALK2) in fibrodysplasia ossificans progressiva (FOP).
evidence: Smad7 or dorsomorphin has been suggested to prevent BMP
